Become a Healthcare Provider and Get paid with Doctoora Instantly.

Get unlimited access to Medical Facilities & Equipment to see your patients on Doctoora from ₦15,000 per month. We bring patients to you and also take care of the location of consultancy if need be.

How The Doctoora Healthcare Provider System Works

In just 4 simple steps you can unlock unlimited access to delivering the best
healthcare service with our help to one patient at a time.

Sign up

Sign up as a professional

Setup your profile

Tell us what service you would be providing.

Submit your pricing

Submit pricing and credentials for Verification.

Setup Availability

Setup your availability structure so patients can find you.

Why Choose Doctoora?

Since we are the first of the kind in Nigeria, lets tell you what makes us special already.

Work Conveniently

Make additional income in your spare time. We have a network of facilities in different locations where you can meet with your patients.

Patient Management

Enjoy a patient management software created just for you. Our focus is to enable you to run a thriving practice without worrying about costs and administrative issues.

Access to a Community

HOur ecosystem is made up of amazing healthcare professionals. By joining us, you will have access to this ecosystem through our various community engagement programs and events.

Flexible Payment Plan

We offer our facilities for rent on a pay-per-use tariff plan and also on monthly subscription plans giving you the flexibility you need.

Meet your Patients In Doctoora Locations

Doctoora is a multi-location private healthcare network with over 4000 verified healthcare service providers, dedicated to delivering quality healthcare services to the people of Nigeria. Join Doctoora and spread your private practice across multiple locations and deliver value to more clients without incurring high setup costs.

What Doctoora Professionals Say

Not every industry needs an “Uber” model, but healthcare might. This story unpacks the Doctoora business model to see how its utilizing spare capacity to provide Nigerians with affordable healthcare.

Stears Business

@Stears Business

Doctoora health Is doing great stuff in the private space. The government should be focusing on the affordability of these services for Nigerians. We're lightyears behind on that.

Femi

Obaluaye_
